job.title: Principal Software Engineer, Marketplace Apps
job.description: Overview Top "Must-Have" Skills for this job: 8+ years of professional experience building backend web applications Strong knowledge and experience with the web request/response lifecycle an API design Hands-on experience with Node.JS and TypeScript Software development experience with transactional systems, trading systems, e-commerce, or marketplaces Experience deploying and monitoring software in the cloud (AWS) Strong communicator with both technical and non-technical professionals Bachelor or Master’s Degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a Related Field Selling Points Full Benefits (Medical, Dental, Vision) 401K Plan PTO, Sick Days Parental Leave Ability to work Remote Catered Lunches And much more!
